title: Exercise 3 - Humanoid Robot Modeling with URDF
description: In this exercise, you'll create your own humanoid robot model using URDF (Unified Robot Description Format). You'll learn how to define links, joints, and materials to create a complete robot model that can be visualized and simulated.
